name: Load_Cluster1_5
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(SM_Enterprise_Cluster_Sub_5)*>
<*CTX( Container(SM_Enterprise_Cluster_Sub_5).LoadKeys(ListIndex).Load(select <*eval(Replace(Replace("<*VALUE(cluster1)*>","| ","' as LocationCluster UNION SELECT ") + "'","#"," as ListIndex ,'"))*> as LocationCluster  ))*>
